## `r tour[i]` {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}

### Chronologically

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = 'asis', message = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
t <- (all %>% filter(end == tour[i]) %>% arrange(desc(date)))
pander(t)
```

### By time

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = 'asis', message = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
t <- (all %>% filter(end == tour[i] & time != "") %>% arrange(time, desc(date)))
pander(t)
```
